ValidationRule.description: If the Contact's RecordType = 'Internal', then only Administrative, Siemens or Siemens Helathineers Accounts can be used as parent
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.Name == 'Internal' && Account.RecordType.Name != 'Administrative Account' && Account.RecordType.Name != 'Siemens' && Account.RecordType.Name != 'Siemens Healthineers'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: In case of Internal Contact, only Account with Administrative, Siemens or Siemens Helathineers Record Type can be added
